meanings.definition: The quality or state of being joky or humorous.
meanings.sent1: Her jokinesses always brighten up the room.
meanings.sent2: His jokinesses added a fun atmosphere to the party.
meanings.sent3: The jokinesses of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The jokinesses of the situation were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember her jokinesses during our school days.

meanings.definition: The tendency to make jokes or be playful.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokinesses entertained the audience for hours.
meanings.sent2: His jokinesses often lighten the mood in serious situations.
meanings.sent3: The jokinesses of the children playing in the park were contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her jokinesses were like a refreshing breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: I admire his jokinesses, they bring joy to everyone around him.
